item.description:
NONA (Nichiren Order of North America) along with New York Daiseion Ji and Nichiren Buddhist Sangha of Greater New England will sponser a regional Dharma Conference. The conference will include lectures, training and fun projects on Nichiren Buddhism and time to meet other members of the greater Sangha. Their will be more to come on teachers, events and accomidations. Register early as space will be limited.

The Conference will begin: 9:00am Saturday the 14th and conclude at 6:00pm Sunday the 15th. The registration fee is $50. Registration fee is due by the 11th of July. You may use this meetup to pay by credit card or send a check or pay by cash at the Temple.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org

www.nichiren-shu.org/NONA

www.nichiren-shu.org/Newyork
item.name: NONA Dharma Conference
